onboard_desc_1: Trakli se concentre sur l'essentiel et fournit juste ce dont vous avez besoin pour savoir d'où vient votre argent et où il va.
onboard_desc_2: Let us pick up transactions for you from you sms and fill the income expense report before you get there. You can also share various statements with us like from email.
onboard_desc_3: It does not cost anything to use Trakli
